answers.author: Israel Murguia
answers.text:
The City of Tifton, GA has an Effectiveness and Efficiency Committee. The committee is composed of 29 citizens – appointed by the council. The committee is organized into four subcommittees – Intergovernmental Services, Revenue, General Government, and Enterprise Operations. Among many tasks, the committee examines outsourcing opportunities wherever possible, such as county pick-up of garbage and payroll. For information regarding RFPs, you can contact the city manager’s office at 229-391-3937 or email at mvollmer@tifton.net. I have attached a copy of the committees report for your review.

author: Pamela Muse
text:
The City of Colorado Springs, CO is looking for information regarding “Outsourcing Committees.”   Do you have a group of citizens/business reps/elected officials that oversee or review outsourcing opportunities?  If you do, does the committee evaluate managed competition RFP’s etc.?  And, how was the committee established and by whom? 
Any help would be greatly appreciated! 
Have a great day!   
Curt DeCapite
Procurement Services Manager
Phone:  (719) 385-5274
cdecapite@springsgov.com
title: Outsourcing Committee
